sources.title: Colossus And The Amazon Queen
sources.description: 1960 directed by Vittorio Sala starring Rod Taylor, Ed Fury, Dorian Gray, Daniela Rocca, Gianna Maria Canale, Alberto Farnese and Giorgia Moll. Â  Glauco (Ed Fury), and his friend Pirro, (Rod Taylor), set sail to unknown shores and find themselves, along with their crew, in the land of Amazons who view men as slaves and pets. Comic sword and sandal pic with music sets and dance numbers.
